hints.title: Complete Summary - Episodes Sample Riemannian Volume
hints.content:
777: :label: thm-complete-summary-riemannian-sampling
778: 
779: The following statements have been proven rigorously:
780: 
781: **1. Stratonovich formulation (Chapter 07)**
782: 
783: The Adaptive Gas Langevin SDE uses Stratonovich interpretation $\circ dW$, which is physically correct for state-dependent diffusion from fast degrees of freedom.
784: 
785: **2. Kramers-Smoluchowski reduction (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-stratonovich-kramers-smoluchowski`)**
786: 
787: In high-friction limit $\gamma \gg 1$, spatial dynamics reduces to:
788: 
789: $$
790: dx = -\frac{1}{\gamma} \nabla U_{\text{eff}} \, dt + \sqrt{\frac{2T}{\gamma}} g^{-1/2} \circ dW
791: $$
792: 
793: **3. Stationary distribution (Graham 1977, Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-stratonovich-stationary-general`)**
794: 
795: The Stratonovich stationary distribution is:
796: 
797: $$
798: \rho_{\text{st}} \propto (\det D)^{-1/2} e^{-U} = \sqrt{\det g} \, e^{-U}
799: $$
800: 
801: **4. QSD spatial marginal (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-qsd-spatial-marginal-detailed`)**
802: 
803: $$
804: \boxed{\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x) \propto \sqrt{\det g(x)} \exp\left(-\frac{U_{\text{eff}}(x)}{T}\right)}
805: $$
806: 
807: **5. Graph Laplacian convergence (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-graph-laplacian-convergence-consequence`)**
808: 
809: $$
810: \Delta_{\text{graph}} f \xrightarrow{N \to \infty} C \Delta_g f
811: $$
812: 
813: **Chain of implications:**
814: 
815: Stratonovich SDE → Kramers-Smoluchowski → Graham's theorem → $\rho \propto \sqrt{\det g}$ → Belkin-Niyogi → $\Delta_{\text{graph}} \to \Delta_g$
